/sddn/inspur/ompi31/bin/mpicxx  -O3 -DNDEBUG   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/postprocess.dir/postprocess.cpp.o  -o ../../bin/relion_postprocess -Wl,-rpath,/apps/software/relion-2.1_gaoxing/build/lib:/apps/software/relion-2.1_gaoxing/external/fftw/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/sddn/inspur/ompi31/lib:/apps/software/relion-2.1_gaoxing/external/fltk/lib: ../../lib/librelion_lib.so ../../../external/fftw/lib/libfftw3.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcufft.so /sddn/inspur/ompi31/lib/libmpi.so -ldl ../../lib/librelion_gpu_util.so ../../../external/fltk/lib/libfltk.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -lrt -ldl
